message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. It is an exceptional opportunity that I believe will greatly benefit your business. I am offering this valuable asset to you for $1,500,000. This price reflects its true worth and includes all necessary components and services. I look forward to discussing the details with you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, $1,500,000 is above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for it, which reflects its fair market value and allows for a profitable deal for both of us. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
